title: Future Market Rune and New Support Item
body: If Your guys happen to have future market rune and have support item and if u have items pieces for Unholy grail or something locket and can't upgrade sell your support item at base do the undo button and u should able to upgrade your items i think this only happen when u have future market please look this up

replies.body:
>The Help & Support board is here to address technical issues, or any other League-related questions you have for our Player Support team.

>DO NOT post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules
